resources.string: Authentication failed, please try it again.
Do you want to change the co-host to %s?
Do you want to change the host to %s?
Do you want to delete this meeting\'s history record?
Do you want to delete this meeting?
Would you like to dial into the meeting automatically?\n\nAfter dialing into the meeting, please return to Zoom.
To keep this meeting running, please assign a Host before you click Leave.
This will stop other\'s screen sharing. Do you want to continue?
Do you want to leave this meeting?
No new attendees can join this meeting once locked.
Only host can screen share once locked.
Please login to schedule a meeting.
Please login to get your meetings.
Please login to start a video call.
Please login to start a free phone call.
Please login to start a meeting.
Do you want to log out?
Connection Failed. Please check your network connection and try again.
You cannot start screen share while the other participant is sharing.
You have reached the maximum number of group members.
Ensure that no other apps are using the camera and then try again.
Failed to start the video camera.
Do you want to leave this meeting and join another?
Do you want to leave this meeting and start another?
Do you want to leave this meeting and start another?
New attendees can join this meeting once unlocked.
Attendee can now screen share once unlocked.
Unsupported document type, please select an image or PDF document!
Tap to join the started Breakout Room.
Do you want to leave this Breakout Room and return to the main session?
The host has opened Breakout Rooms. Please wait to be assigned.
This may take a few moments.
You can invite the host to this Breakout Room for assistance.
The Breakout Room has been ended by the host.
You will be returned to the main session automatically.
All participants have been given %d seconds to leave their Breakout Rooms.
The host is currently in this room.
The host is currently helping others. Please try again later.
The host is inviting you to join Breakout Rooms.
Breakout Rooms will close in %d seconds
Join with a meeting room name
The number you dialed is not supported.
The number you dialed is not available until the host joins.
The number you dialed has not been responding to join the meeting.
Input your phone number to call
Input invitee\'s name and phone number to call
Only signed-in users can join this meeting
Enter someone\'s Email to find them on Zoom
has been added to your contact list
Your microphone is unmuted, double tap to stop speaking.

requests to add you as a contact
Current view is gallery video, double tap to show toolbar.
Current view is gallery video, double tap to hide toolbar.

Current view is active speaker, double tap to hide toolbar.
Current view is share, double tap to show toolbar.
Current view is share, double tap to hide toolbar.
Your microphone is muted, double tap to speak.
Local storage is not ready. Cannot download this file.
Do you want to download this file using your mobile data network?
No associated application to open this file.
Enter email addresses here, separated by commas.
You cannot chat with a Zoom Room
Enter your own audio conference information
Private chat has been disabled by host
Do you want to turn Bluetooth ON to connect to Kubi?
To connect to Kubi, you need to allow Zoom to access this device\'s location.
To connect to Kubi, you need to turn on the location service (GPS) on this device.
I agree to the Terms of Service.
Specify your preference to be notified by Sound or Vibration when a new message arrives.
Automatically connect audio using internet when joining a meeting
Always mute my microphone when joining a meeting
To invite people to Google IM, type their email addresses below:
Contact request has been sent to \n%s

Enable phone contacts matching helps you find more contacts on Zoom
Driving Mode turns on speaker, stops video and mutes microphone
Automatically connect Kubi robot device when joining a meeting. (This allows for remote control of your Kubi robot in Zoom meetings when far-end camera control is enabled.)
Incorrect meeting password, please try again
Enter meeting ID to join a meeting
When enabled, new attendee can\'t join this meeting.
When enabled, only host can share content.
Meeting ID is a 9 or 10 digit number
Add Zoom contact via email address
Please enter your name and the meeting password
Always turn off my video when joining a meeting
Cannot connect to our service, please check your network connection and try again.
This ID is taken, please choose a new ID.
Cannot edit meeting ID while meeting is in progress.
Failed to apply Personal Meeting ID. Error code: %d
*Your Personal Meeting ID cannot start with number 0 or 1.
*Recommends phone number as your Personal Meeting ID
Server %s requires you to enter user name and password
You\'ve been automatically signed out for being inactive %s minutes due to your account security policy.
%1$s invited you to this group message
You invited %1$s to this group message
%1$s invited you to this group message
You invited %1$s to this group message
You changed the group name to \"%s\"
You removed %1$s from this group message
%1$s removed you from this group message
You have been removed from this group
You can save a group here by turning on \"Save to Contacts List\" in the group chat options.
Unable to add contacts to the group message. (Error Code: %d)
You have reached the maximum number of group members.
Unable to add a Zoom contact.
Your request has been sent successfully!
Messenger is inactive. You cannot add a Zoom contact.
Cannot add this contact. The contact is running an older version of Zoom.
The contact is running an older version which does not support group messaging.
Messenger is inactive. You cannot remove a Zoom contact.
Unable to change your screen name.
Do you want to clear this group message\'s history?
Do you want to clear this chat\'s history?
Unable to download the audio file.
Unable to download the image file
Unable to load the image file
Unable to start a group message. (Error Code: %d)
Failed to start a group message for more members.
Unable to play the audio message.
You will no longer receive messages from this group.
Unable to leave this group message. (Error Code: %d)
Failed to record your voice. Audio device is busy.
Unable to remove the contact from this group message. (Error Code: %d)
Couldn\'t match %1$s to a person on Zoom
You have logged in from another device. Messenger is now inactive.
Unable to upload the profile photo.
The account does not exist. Please try again.
Can\'t activate your account. Please check your network connection and try again.
Didn\'t receive email? Check your spam folder.
We sent an email to verify your account.
We can show your phone\'s Contacts using Zoom.
You are using the device audio.
Your invitation has been sent successfully.
%s is calling you.\n\nYou are already in another meeting, do you want to leave and join this meeting?
Can not start a call while you are in another meeting.
You cannot unmute yourself as host has muted all attendees.
The meeting host has upgraded to Pro account. This meeting has no time limitation anymore.
This meeting will be ended in %d minutes as the host has not joined yet.
Your account has been upgraded successfully. Your meeting has no time limitation anymore.
Invite your contacts to join this meeting
This meeting ID is not valid. Please check and try again.
This meeting has been ended by host.
Failed to connect to Zoom video conferencing server. If you are behind a firewall, please ask your IT administrator to allow \"*.zoom.us\". For more information, please visit: %s
The meeting is for internal only.
Please sign in with your company account to join.
This meeting has been locked by the host.
This meeting room name is not valid. Please check and try again.
A new version of Zoom is available! Please update now.
Can\'t connect to our service, please check your network connection and try again. Error code: %d
Our service is currently busy. Please try again later.
Our service is currently busy. Please try again later.
Please sign in with your company account to join
You have a meeting that is currently in-progress. Please end it to start a new meeting.
The host has a meeting that is currently in-progress. Once that meeting ends, you can join this meeting.
This meeting has an unexpected error.\nError code: %d
This meeting has reached a maximum of %d participants. Please try again later.
Host has denied your webinar registration.
You need to be signed in with the specified Zoom account to join this meeting. Please contact the host for more information.
Registration for this webinar is full.
If you are the host, please sign in to start the webinar.
If you were invited as a panelist, please join the webinar from the link in your email invitation.
You need to have colleagues in your zoom account so you can add them to your company contacts. Please click Configure Account to add colleagues.
You are about to start a meeting and invite all members of this group to join. Are you sure?
We are sorry that this device is not supported!
Connection Failed. Please try again later.
Double tap screen to cancel pin video.
Chat encryption has been enabled for your account so you cannot send messages to offline contacts.
Chat encryption has been enabled for %s\'s account so you cannot send messages to offline contacts.
[%s is inviting you to chat, you need to update your client to join]
Chat encryption has been enabled for this group, offline members cannot see your messages.
Chat encryption has been enabled for your account so you cannot send messages in a group without encryption.
Chat encryption has been enabled for your account so you need to invite %s online to start chat.
Chat encryption has been enabled for %1$s account so you need to invite %2$s online to start chat.
Chat encryption has been enabled for your account so you cannot send messages to a person who is not your contact.
%s is using an older version of the Zoom client and cannot see your messages.
You can start end to end encrypted chat with %s now.
Can\'t edit meeting. Please check your network connection and try again.
Can\'t edit the meeting. Error code: %d
We don\'t store any contact information.
Please enter the verification code sent by the SMS
You are removed from this meeting by the host.
For technical support, please visit Support.\n\nWe also welcome your ideas, requests or comments. Please enter your feedback here:
Choose a file (PDF or image format) to share with participants.
This free meeting has ended. Thank you for choosing Zoom!
To reset your password, please enter your email address. You may need to check your spam folder.
Please set your new password to login.
%s is calling you from Zoom, click link to join.\r\n%s
Or call the person and say:
The meeting has ended because the host doesn\'t show up.
If you received an invitation link, tap on the link again to join the meeting.\nOr type meeting ID below to join
If you received an invitation link, tap on the link to join the meeting.
Link your account to find more contacts from your network. With your account linked, you can use features like Personal Meeting ID.
Failed to load contacts in your organization.
Host %1$s is not in the meeting, please login as host if you are %2$s.
Your login has expired. Tap to login again.
This meeting has been ended by the host.
This meeting has ended as someone has started a new meeting with this account.
For the best meeting experience, You may be asked to need access to your microphone, camera and storage.
This free meeting will end in 10 minutes. The meeting host needs to upgrade to a paid account at $14.99 per month for unlimited minutes.
Your free meeting will end in 10 minutes, please upgrade to a paid account at $14.99 per month for unlimited minutes.
All and new participants will be muted
Your microphone is muted to focus on %s as the spotlight video.
Your microphone is muted so you can hear remote audio during screen sharing.
To save your data traffic, we only show Active Speaker.
Create a name for this group
Please enable your address book matching in Contacts.
Click Add button above to add company contacts.
You have no contacts in your address book.
The scheduled meetings will be listed here.
If you are the host, please log in to start this meeting
Upgrade to Pro to change your Personal Meeting ID.
Your phone number is not valid for registration. Please register again.

%s will be removed from your company contacts list.

Thanks for your feedback!\n\nYour feedback is very important to us, and we\'re working hard to improve our service.

Please allow Zoom to access your microphone from device settings.

Send message failed, the selected buddy is offline or has left meeting.

The host has made you a panelist.

%s will be rejoining the webinar as a panelist.
